Label: plant phenological trait
Text definition: A quality of a a whole plant that provides phenologically relevant information about the whole plant.

Label: abscised plant structure presence
Text definition: A plant phenological trait}that is measured by the number of some plant structure that a whole plant has abscised.
Comments: The number can be 0 or more.

Label: seedling presence
Text definition: A plant phenological trait that is measured by whether or not a whole plant is a seedling.
Comments: For consistency with other trait measurements, seedling presence'is also measured with a count, which must be a binary value: 0 if the plant is a seedling, 1 if it is not.

Label: abscised leaf presence
Text definition: A plant phenological trait that is measured by the number of true leaves true leaf that a whole plant has abscised.
Comments: The number can be 0 or more

Label: abscised fruit or seed presence
Text definition: A plant phenological trait that is measured by the number of a whole plant's ripe fruits ripe fruit that have been abscised or removed by an herbivore and/or the number of ripe fruits on a whole plant that have abscised at least one mature seed.
Comments: The number can be 0 or more.

Label: abscised cone or seed presence
Text definition: A plant phenological trait that is measured by the number of a whole plant's ripe seed cones that have been abscised or removed by an herbivore and/or the number of ripe seed cones on a whole plant that have abscised at least one mature seed.
Comments: The number can be 0 or more and only includes the most recent cone crop.

Label: plant structure present
Text definition: A plant structure presence trait that is a quality of a whole plant that has at least one of some plant structure as part.
Equivalent to: 'plant structure presence' and ('quality of' some ('whole plant' and ('has visible part' some 'plant structure')))

Label: abscised plant structure present
Text definition: An abscised plant structure presence trait that is a quality of a whole plant from which at least one of some plant structure has been abscised or removed.
Equivalent to: 'abscised plant structure presence' and ('depends on structure' some (abscised some 'plant structure')) and ('quality of' some ('whole plant' and (abscised some 'plant structure')))

Label: abscised leaf present
Text definition: An abscised leaf presence trait that is a quality of a whole plant from which at least one true leaf  has been abscised.
Equivalent to: abscised plant structure presence' and ('depends on structure' some (abscised some 'true leaf')) and ('quality of' some ('whole plant' and (abscised some 'true leaf')))

Label: abscised fruit or seed present
Text definition: An abscised fruit or seed presence trait that is a quality of a whole plant from which at least one ripe fruit has been abscised or removed by an herbivore or that has at least one ripe fruit from which at least one mature seed has been abscised.
Equivalent to: 'abscised plant structure presence' and ('depends on structure' some (abscised some 'plant structure')) and ('quality of' some ('whole plant' and (abscised some 'plant structure')))

Label: abscised cone or seed present
Text definition: An abscised cone or seed presence trait that is a quality of a whole plant from which at least one ripe seed cone has been abscised or removed by an herbivore or that has at least one ripe seed cone that has at least one mature seed that has abscised.
Equivalent to: ' 'ripe seed cone' OR 'mature seed' abscised plant structure presence' AND 'quality of' SOME ('whole plant' AND 'abscised' SOME ('ripe seed cone' OR 'mature seed')) AND 'depends on structure' SOME ('abscised' SOME ('ripe seed cone' OR 'mature seed'))ÊIncludes abscised clause

Label: abscised plant structure absent
Text definition: An abscised plant structure presence trait that is a quality of a whole plant from which none of some plant structure have been abscised or removed.
Equivalent to: abscised plant structure presence' and ('quality of' some ('whole plant' and (not (abscised some 'plant structure')))) and ('depends on structure' only (not (abscised some 'plant structure')))

Label: abscised leaf absent
Text definition: An abscised leaf presence trait that is a quality of a whole plant from which no true leaves PPO:0001013 have been abscised.
Equivalent to: abscised leaf presence' and ('quality of' some ('whole plant' and (not (abscised some 'true leaf')))) and ('depends on structure' only (not (abscised some 'true leaf')))

Label: abscised fruit or seed absent
Text definition: An abscised fruit or seed presence trait that is a quality of a whole plant from which no ripe fruits have been abscised or removed by herbivores and that does not have any ripe fruits from which any mature seeds have abscised.
Equivalent to: 'abscised plant structure presence' and ('quality of' some ('whole plant' and (not (abscised some ('mature seed' or 'ripe fruit'))))) and ('depends on structure' only (not (abscised some ('mature seed' or 'ripe fruit'))))

Label: abscised cone or seed absent
Text definition: An abscised cone or seed presence trait that is a quality of a whole plant from which no ripe seed cones PPO:0001052 have been abscised or removed by herbivores and that does not have any ripe seed cones from which any mature seeds have abscised.
